description:
make.bash: more robustly detect gold 2.20

On recent Debian systems the gold 2.20 check triggers though
Debian doesn't have version 2.20 but rather has:

        GNU gold (GNU Binutils for Debian 2.21.52.20110606) 1.11
                                                ^^^^

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org, iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello rsc@golang.org, iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Your current regexp doesn't work.  The word 'gold' and the
version number are not next to each other.  I would be happy
with 'gold.* 2\.20'.

Russ

Hello rsc@golang.org, iant@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=63b30d425c48 ***

make.bash: more robustly detect gold 2.20

On recent Debian systems the gold 2.20 check triggers though
Debian doesn't have version 2.20 but rather has:

        GNU gold (GNU Binutils for Debian 2.21.52.20110606) 1.11
                                                ^^^^

R=rsc, iant
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5252055

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 5252055: make.bash: more robustly detect gold 2.20
